name: Larry
description: I’m hopeless and romantic i love the idea of falling in love!. I try to live everyday like it is my last because you never know if tomorrow is coming, I don’t have regrets because its not wortoutspoken person, I say whats on my mind. I’m also a very strong minded person, i wont do anything i don’t want to. if you know me you know I’m a ver don’t make plans, It never ends up working out anyways so why waste time?! I do spur of the moment (more fun)… im spontaneous and hardworking
